reasons: New wallet (45 days old) requires monitoring to establish behavior patterns
High transaction velocity (87 tx/30d) may indicate automated trading or bot activity
Low counterparty diversity (0.35) suggests concentrated trading with few partners
Not delegating ADA reduces network participation and stability indicators
Holdings include speculative tokens with unknown risk profiles

perspectives.security: Moderate risk. New wallet with high activity. No malicious patterns detected yet, but limited history.
perspectives.defi: Elevated risk. High exposure to new/speculative tokens. No staking reduces stability.
perspectives.behavioral: Concerning patterns. High velocity with low diversity suggests possible bot or day-trading activity.
perspectives.compliance: Moderate concern. No known labels. Activity patterns warrant monitoring.
